about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Sergio Zabala, and I am a web developer based in Madrid, Spain. I have a great passion for software development üßëüèª‚Äçüíª. I love to learn and improve my skills. When I'm not programming you can find me playing a video game üéÆ or playing my guitar üé∏.
about.pageDescription: My name is Sergio Zabala, and I'm a web developer based in Madrid, Spain. Here you can find a brief presentation of me and opinions of people who have worked with me.

opinions.name: Clara Ort√≠z
opinions.text: It has been a pleasure to work with Sergio, he is a person who never gives up, very professional, with clear objectives, perseverant and shows his passion for programming. You can see his great capacity, he is constantly learning new languages and methodologies, besides proposing ideas for the final application. The dedication he puts into each project is incredible, having completed complex projects in a self-taught way. It is a pleasure to work with him, I would highlight his desire to help the team, as I have been able to develop more knowledge about new technologies thanks to his help. When Sergio is in your team you know that everything will be fine!

opinions.name: Juan Jos√© Mar√≠n
opinions.text: Extraordinary collaboration with Sergio. A very positive attitude and total commitment to the project that made everything we asked him to do possible. We would not have been able to start our ecommerce without him.

opinions.name: David Jimenez
opinions.text: Sergio is a committed and responsible person. His attitude in the work environment is excellent, anticipating problems and looking for solutions so that the customer is always satisfied. He is very demanding with himself so he always looks for the best adaptation and perfection in his work. If you are looking for a person who treats your project as if it were his own, Sergio is your man.

opinions.name: H√©ctor Pula
opinions.text: Working with Sergio is synonymous with security, he shows passion for his work and knows how to solve any problem that may arise both internally and with the client, he always gives 110% of himself.

opinions.name: Iv√°n Mar√≠n
opinions.text: After a bad experience with a company that was only able to deny me every single thing I asked for, I talked to Sergio and it was the opposite. His answer was always 'it can be done, you just have to find a way', and he always found it. It's a pleasure to work with someone like that, so willing and with the attitude to get things done. You can tell he enjoys his work and faces every challenge that comes his way.

experience.title: Experience
experience.pageDescription: My name is Sergio Zabala, and I am a web developer based in Madrid, Spain. Here you can find both the technologies with which I have experience and the last sites I have worked on.

projects.title: Projects
projects.pageDescription: My name is Sergio Zabala, and I'm a web developer based in Madrid, Spain. Here you can find some of the projects I have worked on.

projects.name: MistMeals
projects.text: Web application to offer healthy food delivery services, weekly menu generator and administration section.

projects.name: Kyubidex
projects.text: Personal project of a pokedex using the pokeapi for learning purposes.

projects.name: Personal Landing
projects.text: Personal web to make myself known as well as to show my experience and projects both personal and those in which I have worked.

projects.name: Mail Api
projects.text: Microservice created for sending mails from a contact form.
